name: ENERGY SWORD CIRNO
description:
A fanmade touhou ENDLESS SCORE ATTACK POKE-EM-UP where you slay dozens of fairies as Cirno and try to avoid dying.

This game was developed on a complete whim on 9/9/2018 to celebrate the convergence of ENERGY SWORD SUNDAY and Cirno Day. It is art.

The zip should contain everything you need to play.
